Content.Text:
<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good. Everyone looks healthy and happy today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hm? Uh-oh... Are you starting to get sick?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello <MYNAME>. Did you need to see me
for some reason? Sorry, could I ask you to wait
just a moment?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whew. There, that should do it. The symptoms
are still mild, so I shouldn't need to do much
before I take it home with me.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry to have kept you waiting, <MYNAME>.
This flower was presenting symptoms of illness.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
It should be fine, though. I gave it some quick
little treatments. It should recover nicely in time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now, what was it you needed to see me for?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? You just happened across me, so you
decided to come by and say hi?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>O-oh...er, I see. This is just like that other time,
isn't it? Before we started dating...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Which makes me think I haven't grown or
improved in the least.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Anytime I'm around plants, that's where my
attention goes. Period.
<PAGE>
It seems like I can't help but neglect you and
cause you grief...
Do you like plants better?
I don't mind at all.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? What are you talking about?
<PAGE>
It's not a question of which I "like better." There's
no way to compare... You're all important to me.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What...? If I had to pick one...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Are you honestly asking me that?!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, to me, studying and handling plants is my
life!
<PAGE>
No matter how I tried, I could never give it up.
Ever! But you, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
I know I have trouble expressing this, but to me,
you're every bit as precious as my studies. I can't
imagine living without either.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Is there something wrong with that?
<PAGE>
You should know by now how important plants
are to me.
<PAGE>
Are you honestly going to demand that I make
that choice?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
No, you don't need to apologize. It's not that I
don't understand what you're trying to say.
<PAGE>
And sometimes I do take advantage of your
kindness and understanding to put my studies
first.
<PAGE>
AND I'll be the first to admit I'm bad at
expressing my feelings. It's hard for me to find
the right words. So I get why you'd ask that.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
But just like I said, to me, you are very...very
important.
<PAGE>
I don't think I'll be able to choose one of you
over the other, now or ever. I hope you'll
remember that, at least.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll try to express my feelings for you more in
what I say and do.
<PAGE>
But it'll probably take time. Have patience.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm glad to hear that. You're always so
considerate of me, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>And...if there's anything you really need to say to
me, you can say it. All right?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Wh-wha?! You want to know how much I like
you?!
<PAGE>
Wh-where did that question come from?! Is this
your new way of teasing me?!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Er...yes, I did say you could say anything to
me...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But um...you should already know that without
me having to say it.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Urk...!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
A-all right. Exactly how much is difficult to
express in words, but...
<PAGE>
Er...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>I-I like you just as much as plants!!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>D-don't laugh!! Yes! I know it all comes back to
plants again! B-but, if I have to say it myself...
<PAGE>
...saying I like you just as much as plants is a
very impressive compliment!
<PAGE>
It means that I care for you so much I would
give you my life...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>AUGH!! Wh-what am I saying! Rock... A rock...!
Somebody give me a rock I can crawl under!!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>B-besides, what about you, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>I said wh-what about you? About how much do
you, er...ah...l-...like me...?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>Oh...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>Errr... Ah! That's right! I'm... I'm thirsty! So let's
go grab a drink at the restaurant!

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L>Oh! Um...one thing, first.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_L><MYNAME>? Could we, ah...hold hands...?
